content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the historical significance of the view of the importance of the navy expressed by the kaiser in the passage?

choices.label: It demonstrates the effects of the breakdown of the diplomatic system established in the Concert of Europe.
It shows the growing antagonisms in Europe created by Bismarckâ€™s foreign policy based on the principles of Realpolitik.
It demonstrates the thinking behind the arms race that contributed to diplomatic tensions between Germany and Great Britain.
It shows the growing influence of mass-based political parties on the foreign policies of the major European states.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
